name: Draw Squares FREE - Classic game about dots, lines and little squares
name_original: Draw Squares FREE - Classic game about dots, lines and little squares
description:
DRAW SQUARES is the classic game we played in the school. Two players take turns to place a line between two adjacent dots trying to form a square. The player who makes more squares when the board is full wins.

Now this fantastic game is available for your iPhone with amazing functionalities:

- One player mode: Compete against the computer and show your skills.
- Two player local mode: Play with a friend in your iPhone.
- Multiplayer WiFi mode: Compete with your friends via WiFi.

We hope you enjoy this game. Try out our other games and apps by tapping More Great Apps button in the Options Menu.
